nodes.text: The Stenness system contained seven inhabited planets, including Kamsul and Stenness, and an asteroid field. It was part of the Stenness Node. The Tchuukthai Jedi Master Thon was the Jedi Watchman of the system c. 4000 BBY.
Millennia later, Han Solo and Salla Zend smuggled spice to the system. Crimelord BolBol the Hutt was known to be practically in control of the system as of 0 BBY.
